name: Far Too Much
description:
Winner of Best Game, Awesomest Visuals, and Best Mechanics at CreateJam2017 Spring.

A game about an introverts journey to their comfortable pillow fort, through cascades of drunkards - Ice Climber style!

Controls:

Movement: A, D / Arrow keys || Jumping: Space (You can double jump :3 )|| Change song: 1-5

Music by:

BoxCat Games - "Epic Song" http://freemusicarchive.org/music/BoxCat_Games/

The Freak Fandango Orchestra - "Requiem for a Fish" http://freemusicarchive.org/music/The_Freak_Fandango_Orchestra/

Vibe Tracks - "Sugar" and "Beat Your Competition" https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLzxBZh8Pt1tbJSC6uhlwm02OVt874NuMH

Audionatix - "Transportation" http://audionautix.com/

KeOSz - "KeO1" https://www.facebook.com/KeOSzMusic/
